pkgmetadata.longdescription: Converts ISO 8601 or RFC 3339 date time strings into Python datetime objects Since it’s written as a C module, it is much faster than other Python libraries+ Note: ciso8601 doesn’t support the entirety of the ISO 8601 spec, only a popular subset. Supported subsets: https://github.com/closeio/ciso8601#supported-subset-of-iso-8601
